content:
Here is the organized table with the subject line and body of each email in the sequence: | Step | Timing | Subject Line | Body | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | 1 | Day 1 | Introduction to OutSystems | Dear [Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to reach out to you following our recent webinar on the High Performance Low-Code platform from OutSystems. We had an overwhelming response from attendees, and I wanted to personally extend my |
